title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.240 - Revenue-producing cost centers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.240 - Revenue-producing cost centers

State Regulations

Health facility departments providing direct services to
patients (such as nursing, physical therapy and laboratory) and thereby
generating revenue. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.240

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
